caption.p: Figure S1. Effect of lactose hydrolysis on biomass yield and sugar consumption. M. circinelloides was grown on whey permeate and hydrolyzed whey permeate at pH 4.5 and 34 °C for 72 h. Figure S2. Plot of the natural log of biomass yield (g/L) versus fermentation time. Fermentations conducted at pH 4.5 and 33.6 °C at shake-flask. Table S1. Preliminary experimental design for optimizing pH and fermentation time to improve fungal biomass yield. Table S2. Total fatty acid concentration (nmol/g) measured by the Folch extraction method versus the acid hydrolysis method. (DOCX 30 kb)
